Others: The match will take place on Monday, 14th October 2024.
The match will be shown live on S4C with live coverage from 7:20pm.
The match can also be live streamed on BBC iPlayer.
The match can also be watched on the Viaplay International YouTube channel for free.
The match can be listened to on BBC Radio Wales, BBC Radio Cymru, and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra.
